attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given any vehicle on the roads are subject to road tax, I feel that bicyle users should be party to this. Afterall, they are not supposed to ride on the pavement and therefore contribute to road use (albeit not individually). Maybe a charge of £10 per year would generate income). Regards

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
